module: Module-level comment: RAM_speech_109 is a single-port RAM designed for Altera Cyclone IV GX FPGAs, utilizing `altsyncram` for data handling. It accepts 8-bit addresses, 32-bit data alongside control signals (`rden`, `wren`, `clock`) to execute read/write operations. The internal `sub_wire0` facilitates data transfer to the output `q` after reading from the specified address.
